Name: 14k Triad
Description: Named after an iconic triad in Earth's history, 14k has managed to evade most of the attention of the Capellan authorities by sticking to legal businesses in the Confederation, while 'gifting' regularly the Chancellor Maximillian Liao with a portion of its profits.  This has allowed them to expand their drug trafficking, slavery and racketeering activities to rimward Periphery worlds.
ReputationStatements: Mercenary. Your services we seek, if the terms are agreable to both.

MissionSuccessStatements: Zuò dé hao. Pleased is Victoria with results.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: We are not lenient underling, so watch yourself next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: We should have known there was a traitor amongst our mist. Perhaps a really close one too.
